description: Capacity of the household’s income and agricultural production to recover from shocks or perturbations.
How would the farmer rate the stability of the household income over time?
How effective does the farmer perceive associations or organizations are in supporting business ventures?
Would local farmer cooperatives provide support to the household in case of need?

factor: Satisfaction with quality of local environment
description: How satisfied is the farmer with the quality of their local environment?
How frequently does the farmer exchange information with agricultural extensionists?
Number of years the household has been farming this land.
Does the farmer perceive they receive a fair price for their crops?
How well does the household perceive the management of the community's land and natural resources?
Is the farmer or other household members part of any association or organization?
Number of different information sources the farmer uses regarding farm management.
Yield gap for the main crop, based on actual versus attainable yields.
Has any household member participated in a research or development project in the last 12 months?
